QueryDefinition.Query: SELECT distinct ch.person_id as PersonId, hvid, hv_enc_dt, hv_enc_id, coalesce(enc_prov_id, '') || ';' || coalesce(enc_prov_taxnmy_id, '') ProviderIdKey from cdm_health_verity_cc_ehr_cce_v2776.emr_enc JOIN {ch_sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND hvid = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE where hv_enc_dt is not null order by ch.person_id
